title: SVAR - Spoken English (Indian Accent) (New)
description:
An automated spoken English test that measures fluency, pronunciation, active listening, vocabulary, grammar and spoken English understanding.

Your use of this assessment product may be subject to New York City Law 144 (Regulation of the Use of Automated Employment Decision Tools) (dated July 5, 2023). Compliance with Law 144 is your responsibility. Read more on https://www.shl.com/legal/shl-us-regulatory-compliance/
